class.name: Multigoal
class.brief_description: A class representing multiple goals to be achieved.
class.description: The Multigoal class is used to represent a set of goals that need to be achieved. It provides methods for managing the state variables associated with these goals.

method.name: state_variables
method.description: Returns an array of state variables associated with the multi-goal.

members.member: The current state of the multi-goal, represented as a dictionary of state variables.
